D

do_part1(String) - Static method in class DriverA02.DriverA02
Method do_part1 to check for possible mistakes in movie records and place them in either the bad_movie_records file if they contain mistakes or in their respective file depending on their genre.
do_part2(String) - Static method in class DriverA02.DriverA02
Method do_part2 to create Movie arrays from the valid movie records and serialize these arrays.
do_part3(String) - Static method in class DriverA02.DriverA02
Method do_part3 to deserialize the arrays and make the user able to navigate through the movie records based on their genre
